description:
**Fix Overview**:

To resolve issues related to VBS (Virtualization-Based Security) and Core Isolation, particularly with discrepancies caused by outdated UEFI/Bios versions:

1. Install the UEFI update released in February 2024. This update addresses compatibility issues arising from older firmware versions.
2. Follow manufacturer-specific instructions to ensure a successful update, as each system may have different requirements.

**Details**:
- It is essential to verify that the update aligns with your hardware specifications. 
- Confirm that your system is backed up prior to applying any updates to prevent data loss, as firmware changes may impact system settings. (LLM Synthesized)
